channel.title: Port forwarding help
channel.description: I need a clearer guild to do this please, Im not a computer jenuis as you can see.

item.title: Port forwarding help
item.dc:creator: @Rayne Rayne
item.description:
@Rayne wrote:

to portfoward…

in address bar type . 192.168.1.1

username should be admin, password should be blank unless changed.

If you have linksys for to port foward trigger > apps and gaming

Name is RSPS (doesnt matter ) make the port 43594 make it so its TCP&UDP and enter the last 3 digits of your ip. click here

Read full topic

item.title: Port forwarding help
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

[quote=“willscape, post:3, topic:217716”][quote author=HiddenPker link=topic=286128.msg2316565#msg2316565 date=1215316498]
ok rep me for doing this.

  1. go http://www.no-ip.com
  2. make an acc then go to add
  3. them do one.
  4. then download the no-ip
  5. then port forwqarding u need a router.
    [/quote]

I’m pretty sure, he wants to know how to port forward… lol[/quote]

Yeah I know how to set up a no-ip already.
Im just having truble post forwarding.

Read full topic
